metadata.description: Discover which upsell strategy will maximize your revenue: Classic, Menu, Anchor, or Rollover

questions.question: How would you describe your current customer base?

options.label: Growing Customer Base

options.label: Established Customer Base

options.label: 4-10 Products/Tiers

options.label: Can Create Premium Easily

options.label: Not Possible for My Business

questions.question: Can you track each customer's complete purchase history?

options.label: Full Purchase History Tracking
options.description: I know exactly what each customer has purchased

options.label: Partial Tracking
options.description: I track some purchases but not all details

options.label: Minimal Tracking
options.description: Basic records only

options.label: Moderately Sophisticated

options.label: Beginners/Novices

options.label: Primarily Price Shoppers
